The day finally started after our tentative rules\nhad been laid out.%K%P
The fall festival had only just ended, and we were\nalready starting to clean up the place.%K%P
\dWe're doing cleaning today, right?\d%K%P
\dWe have to finish it before we can start preparing\nfor winter.\d%K%P
\dUnderstood! A wife should always do her best to\nsupport her husband!\d%K%P
Yukari was raring to go, and being rather adorable\nabout it.%K%P
I was surprised she would choose to do actual work\nwith our precious time together instead of,\nwell...flirting or something.%K%P
\dIs something wrong?\d%K%P
\dNah, just wondering... You sure you want to spend\nthe day cleaning?\d%K%P
\dDon't worry about that. I'll be enjoying your\ncompany in my own way.\d%K%P
She grabbed hold of my arm.%K%P
\dHehehe! It's so nice to not have people coming\nbetween us!\d%K%P
\dThat's the rule, yes.\d%K%P
If it wasn't their turn that day, no one was\nallowed to interrupt any show of intimacy.%K%P
That's why neither Kaede nor Shion were butting in\nright now.%K%P
\dI'm trying to gain wife-points by helping out\naround the house. And build a stronger bond, of\ncourse.\d%K%P
\dThere are a lot of things I can help you out with\nwhile sticking close.\d%K%P
\dAnyway, I'll take this side, and you take that.\d%K%P
Yukari managed to move the long table without\nleaving my side.%K%P
I was impressed by how adept she was at such\nthings. Her slender arms were deceptively strong.%K%P
\dHup!\d%K%P
\dYou don't have to push yourself too hard. Let the\nman handle the heavy physical work.\d%K%P
\dHehehe! That's reassuring. Well then, I'll leave\nthis to you, Mr. Manly Man.\d%K%P
Yukari left the job of moving the desk to me with a\nsmile.%K%P
In an attempt to show off my strength in front of\neveryone, I quickly got to work.%K%P
\dWay to go, Akira!\d%K%P
\dI got this!\d%K%P
*swoon* \dMy husband's too cool for words!\d%K%P
Yukari cheered me on from a short distance away.%K%P
I wondered how the scene looked to others, but I\ndecided they'd forgive a little newlywed kidding\naround.%K%P
\dIt's not even noon yet and here you are, puttin'\non a show.\d%K%P
\dSorry, she's been like this since yesterday.\d%K%P
\dS'fine! Might even motivate the other youngsters\nto do something with their lives.\d%K%P
They may realize how nice it is to fall in love\nwith a girl as cute as Yukari.%K%P
Who knows? It might even liven up this little\nvillage a little.%K%P
\dGreat job! Here, let me wipe your perspiration.\d%K%P
\dThanks, Yukari.\d%K%P
She wiped the sweat off my brow for me.%K%P
\dHave a drink! Wouldn't do for you to get\ndehydrated.\d%K%P
Yukari really took great care of me.%K%P
She really was a nice girl, as long as nothing\nhappened to trigger her Tatari.%K%P
\dYukari's turned into such a wonderful wife\nalready.\d%K%P
\dHehehe! All thanks to your teachings!\d%K%P
\dSuch an honest and cute girl you are. Wish my\ndaughter-in-law would learn from you!\d%K%P
\dThe power of love makes everything work out,\nespecially with a husband as wonderful as mine.\d%K%P
\dThough I doubt there's anyone out there that can\ncompare to Akira.\d %K%P
\dAhaha! You don't mince your words, do you?\d%K%P
\dHehehe!\d%K%P
Yukari really hit it off with the local ladies.%K%P
This strength of hers must have contributed to her\npopularity.%K%P
\dAkira, don't stop cleaning.\d%K%P
\dHere, let your lovely wife impart some energy to\nyou!\d%K%P
*smooch* %K%P
Yukari bounced over and lightly kissed my cheek.%K%P
\dEhehe... Did that perk you up?\d%K%P
\dWay too much, if you ask me!\d%K%P
\dHehehe! I'll collect the surplus energy, don't you\nworry.\d %K%P
*smooch*%K%P
She kissed the other cheek this time.%K%P
\dSee? All collected.\d%K%P
\dI see I've got a real plucky wife.\d%K%P
\dWhy wouldn't your wife be overflowing with love\nfor you?\d%K%P
With a smile that brilliant on her face, I just\ncouldn't be mad at her for those daring kisses.%K%P
\dMy, my, you're such a sweet couple.\d%K%P
\dHehehe! Sorry for being such a show-off!\d%K%P
\dDon't be! I always knew things would go well for\nyou, Yukari.\d%K%P
\dThank you! I'll always do my best for my Akira!\d%K%P
What exactly had the local ladies been telling her?%K%P
Had they been teaching her how to behave as a new\nwife? I found myself feeling both expectant and\nunsure at the same time.%K%P
I guess it was all part of the excitement.%K%P
We spent most of the morning putting away the\nbooths and makeshift tents.%K%P
We stacked the dismantled tents in a corner, and\nnearly everything else was cleaned up.%K%P
\dLunch is ready, everyone!\d%K%P
\dWe cooked lots, so eat up! There's still work to\ndo in the afternoon!\d%K%P
Kaede and Shion brought lunch over as we were\nfinishing up part of the work.%K%P
\dThanks, Kaede!\d%K%P
\dI'm here too, you know! Though Kaede did make all\nthe food.\d%K%P
\dIf you're to be Akira's mistress, you should learn\nto cook a dish or two.\d%K%P
\dHuh? That's a job for Akira's wife or better half.\nMistresses are all about love and romance!\d%K%P
\dAre you quite sure about that?\d%K%P
Yukari stepped out, with her wifey face on.%K%P
She wasn't flustered or anything. In fact, she was\nstrangely calm and composed.%K%P
\dWh-What do you mean?\d%K%P
\dSlacking in one part of your support for your man\nmeans you'll slack in other parts too.\d%K%P
\dHere, Akira. I've prepared some food specially for\nmy dear hubby.\d%K%P
Yukari brandished a lunch box she had prepared for\nme.%K%P
\dHow I wish you would only eat the things I made\nfor you...\d%K%P
\dMy handmade food, breaking down within you and\nbecoming a part of you... Eventually, every part of\nyou would have been made by me!\d%K%P
\dHehe! It's so romantic!\d%K%P
Yukari's overzealous affection showed on her face.%K%P
Although it made Shion cringe really hard, I took\nthe food Yukari had made and started eating.%K%P
\dThanks a bunch. Okay, bon appetit!\d%K%P
\dHehehe! Take your time to relish the food. I still\nhave a lot more!\d%K%P
*munch, munch* \d...Delicious!\d%K%P
\dI made it with all your favorites while also\nkeeping nutritional balance in mind. I knew you\nwould love it!\d%K%P
\dMy wife's so thoughtful!\d%K%P
\dAww, go ahead and praise me some more. It'll make\nme want to stick to you and never let go.\d%K%P
\dLike this!\d%K%P
Yukari came close to me while making sure she\nwouldn't interrupt my lunch.%K%P
\dIt's still kinda hard to eat like this.\d%K%P
\dI'll feed you, then!\d%K%P
\dNo, it's fine! Everyone's watching.\d%K%P
\dWhat does it matter? Today's supposed to be my\nday!\d%K%P
She affectionately rubbed herself against me.%K%P
Not caring that Shion and the others were right\nbeside us.%K%P
\dI'm sweating buckets, so don't stick so close to\nme.\d%K%P
\dHehehe! Sweat or drool, all of Akira's bodily\nfluids are like tasty dishes to me!\d%K%P
\d...Okay, just don't start licking me, or\nsomething.\d %K%P
\dI know, I know. I can only do that when no one's\nwatching...right?\d%K%P
I didn't know if she even understood what she was\nsaying sometimes.%K%P
Kaede and Shion were frankly shocked into\nexasperation by the scene before them.%K%P
\dSay, Kaede. Was Yukari...always like this?\d%K%P
\dThis is her in her affectionate mode, I guess.\nHowever, I may have underestimated how extreme\nshe would become given free reign.\d%K%P
\dWithout having to divert our attention anymore,\nher PDAs have gotten a lot more upfront.\d%K%P
*sigh* \d...I wish I could snuggle up to Akira too.\d%K%P
\dTomorrow's my turn, so you're gonna have to wait.\d%K%P
\dI know, I know...\d%K%P
Kaede and Shion gazed longingly at us as we ate\nour lunch.%K%P
\dWhen it's my turn, I'll be ten times more\naffectionate than Yukari could ever be.\d%K%P
\dAkira, can I kiss you? I just really feel like\nkissing you right now.\d%K%P
*smooch*%K%P
Yukari kissed me on the cheek without waiting for a\nreply.%K%P
\dDon't surprise me like that, Yukari.\d%K%P
\dBut your cheeks are so endearingly delectable, I\njust want to eat them up...\d%K%P
\dAnd your lips look yummy too...\d%K%P
\dWhoa now, not the lips...\d%K%P
\dHmm...\d *smooch*%K%P
Yukari pushed her lips onto mine even as I tried to\ncover them out of reflex.%K%P
\d...Tastes like lunch.\d%K%P
\dNow's really not the time for stuff like this...\d%K%P
\dDon't care. I want more!\d%K%P
Yukari kept excitedly kissing me on the lips.%K%P
\dUmm, Kaede? You were saying something about\nbeing ten times more affectionate than Yukari?\d%K%P
\dI-I can't! I could never do something so\nshameless. Not even half as much!\d%K%P
\dI didn't think so...\d%K%P
Kaede fled to the main hall, unable to watch any\nlonger.%K%P
\dSee you later, Aki.\d%K%P
Shion decided to leave as well.%K%P
\dNow we're finally alone together.\d%K%P
\d...What more are you trying to do?\d%K%P
\dThere are so many things I want to do with you,\nAkira. So many things, really!\d%K%P
\dKissing isn't the only way for us to show how much\nwe love each other... I want us to do more\ntogether.\d%K%P
\d...Okay, if you promise to restrain yourself.\d%K%P
\dHehe! You're so nice, Akira. My true prince\ncharming...\d%K%P
Now I thought about it, Yukari had been like this\never since we first met.%K%P
She kept calling me her prince charming, and did\nall she could to show her love for me...%K%P
I couldn't even imagine how hard it must have been\nfor her.%K%P
\dThanks, Yukari.\d%K%P
\dNo, thank you, Akira. I'm grateful from the bottom\nof my heart for your presence.\d%K%P
\d...I see.\d%K%P
The depth of Yukari's feelings was beyond me.%K%P
But I could at least accept them head-on.%K%P
\dCome closer, Yukari. Let me hold you for a bit.\d%K%P
\dOkay!\d%K%P
Yukari quickly leaped into my arms.%K%P
This was my girlfriend, my wife, and soulmate, I\nwas sure.%K%P
\dThe townsfolk are all looking at us, you know?\d%K%P
\dWe're newlyweds, they'll forgive us.\d%K%P
\dI don't mind the staring at all, really...\d%K%P
\dSo let me hold you tight too.\d%K%P
After mumbling that in my embrace, I felt her arms\ntightening around me.%K%P
It wasn't too strong or weak. Just right for the\ntwo of us.%K%P
When two people work to accommodate and grow\ncloser to one another, their feelings are sure to\nget through.%K%P
\d...Am I doing okay as a wife?\d%K%P
\dYou're doing great.\d%K%P
\dHehe... I'm so relieved to hear that.\d%K%P
Our first day together as newlyweds passed by in a\nflash.%K%P
Nothing particularly surprising happened, but it\nwas a day well spent.%K%P
\dAkira, I'm very disappointed.\d%K%P
Yukari was sulking rather noticeably.%K%P
I had no idea what could've made her feel this way.%K%P
\dDid I do something to anger you?\d%K%P
\dI'm not angry. A virtuous wife would never be\nangry at her husband...\d%K%P
\dOh, the mere thought of being angry at you\ndisgusts me! It won't ever happen!\d%K%P
Yukari may have won her position as my wife, but\nher propensity for drama would never change.%K%P
I knew it would be pointless to question her, so I\nlet her continue at her own pace.%K%P
\dA-Anyway, I'm not angry, okay? In fact, I love you\nso much!\d%K%P
\dDo you want me to prove it to you? I'll keep\nkissing you until you understand. Maybe I just want\nto kiss you. I haven't had enough yet!\d%K%P
\dHold on, calm down! You're getting off-topic.\d%K%P
\dOh! I am so sorry! I was so agitated I just\nslipped into Akira-hunting mode...\d%K%P
Wait, 'hunting'?%K%P
It looked like she was preparing to plant a kiss on\nme forcibly.%K%P
\dI'm disappointed because I don't have much time\nwith you left, and yet...\d%K%P
\dYou refused to take a bath with me!\d%K%P
So that was what she was so upset about.%K%P
I'd gone for a bath earlier, while Yukari had been\ngetting dinner ready.%K%P
\dI asked you to join me when I took my bath, but\nyou didn't even respond!\d%K%P
\dYou're such a cold husband! I thought for sure our\nrelationship was a lot hotter than this!\d%K%P
\dWe've taken a bath together before. We've even\nlain beside each other in the nude before! I don't\nknow where we went wrong...\d%K%P
Her tearful accusations were getting more and more\nblatantly played-up.%K%P
She snapped her head up to look straight at me in\nan attempt to gain sympathy.%K%P
\dAt least tell me why.\d%K%P
\dWhy do you want to know?\d%K%P
\dDepending on your answer, I may have to employ\nsome harsh treatment. Specifically, I'll let you\nhave a taste of how good of a wife I really am.\d%K%P
This made me recall the first night Yukari arrived.%K%P
Back when she had actually snuck into my room and\nstraddled me, before Kaede had managed to stop\nher.%K%P
\dAnswer me, Akira!\d%K%P
\d...It's because I'm self-conscious.\d%K%P
\dWhat? That's all?\d%K%P
\dThat's all. I just can't get into the bath with\nsomeone like that, even if she is my wife.\d%K%P
I wasn't exactly averse to Yukari barging in when I\nwas already in the middle of a bath.%K%P
But for some reason the idea of going to meet her\nin the bath completely nude felt awkward.%K%P
\dSo that's the reason? I thought it was because\nsomeone else made love bites all over your body\nand you didn't want me to see!\d%K%P
\dThat's really not likely.\d%K%P
\dLooks like it. Today's my day, after all. So don't\ngo around fraternizing with other women!\d%K%P
\dI haven't been...\d%K%P
I was telling the truth.%K%P
Yukari was the only one I'd been even vaguely\nintimate with today.%K%P
\dOh, thank goodness!\d%K%P
Yukari's expression loosened up, as if a weight had\nbeen lifted from her shoulders.%K%P
\dWere you that worried?\d%K%P
\dShion and Kaede are both attractive and charming\nin their own ways. I thought...\d%K%P
\dDid you just praise them? Is the sky going to fall\ntomorrow?\d%K%P
\dI'd never say it to their faces, of course. We are\nstill rivals, after all.\d%K%P
\dI'm just sizing up the enemy, if you will. Both of\nthem are charming enough to earn your affection.\d%K%P
\dIf I let my guard down, they'll steal you for\nsure. And that...must not happen!\d%K%P
Yukari started to get really worked up, an ominous\nlook slowly spread over her face. %K%P
\dI am Akira's number one... The best wife for him.\nI am peerless...\d%K%P
\dOkay, okay, I get it. Now just relax and look this\nway for a moment.\d%K%P
I pulled Yukari back to reality.%K%P
We stared at each other, suddenly very close.%K%P
\dAkira... I love you... I want to kiss you...\d%K%P
\dIt hasn't even been 24 hours since we first\nkissed. When did you turn into such a big kisser?\d%K%P
\dKissing someone you love is sweeter than honey,\nthat's why! You can get addicted if you're not\ncareful.\d%K%P
\dOr... How about a little licky-licky?\d%K%P
\dSure, whatever you want.\d%K%P
\dMmnn...\d%K%P
She stuck her cute little tongue out between her\nlips.%K%P
\dLicky-licky, please...\d%K%P
I gently ran my own tongue across hers before\npulling into a deep kiss.%K%P
\dHmm...\d *kiss*%K%P
Our wet tongues touched again and again.%K%P
From there it only got more intense. We explored\neach other's mouths until it became hard to tell\nwhere I ended and Yukari began.%K%P
\dMmm...\d *kiss, kiss*%K%P
\dThis is an adult's kiss? I'm in bliss...\d%K%P
She gave a happy little sigh as she lightly touched\nher lips, still wet from our kiss.%K%P
\dYou made me forget all about wanting to bathe\nwith you. You're terrible, Akira.\d%K%P
\dSo you forgive me?\d%K%P
\dI never blamed you. I just wanted to tease you a\nlittle.\d%K%P
\dRight.\d%K%P
That was completely fine with me.%K%P
I wasn't going to blame her for anything either.%K%P
\dYou must be tired. Let's go to bed.\d%K%P
\dYeah, but wait. Are we going to...\d%K%P
\dYes. You're going to bed with your wife, of\ncourse!\d%K%P
\dIt's my wifely privilege and duty to sleep beside\nyou. I'll fight anyone who dares say otherwise!\d%K%P
\dSo just lie back and be my pillow. You can totally\nuse me as your pillow too!\d%K%P
\dWell then, Akira...\d%K%P
\dRemember? It's a divine rule to sleep in the nude!\nSo let's get naked together!\d%K%P
Yukari dimmed the lights.%K%P
All that was left was to decide on a comfortable\nposition to sleep in.%K%P
\dOkay... Hehe, you're so warm, Akira.\d%K%P
Yukari slipped into the spot beside me.%K%P
She wrapped her arms around me lightly, until we\ncould feel each other.%K%P
\dHow does this compare with last night?\d%K%P
\dI guess I'm more used to it now. My heart was\nbeating so much faster before.\d%K%P
\dAw, you mean I don't make your heart race\nanymore?\d%K%P
\dMy heart is pounding so quickly...\d%K%P
Yukari took my hand and pressed it against her\nchest.%K%P
\dCan you tell?\d%K%P
\d...Sorry, but your breasts are kinda making it\nhard for me to think about anything else.\d%K%P
\dYou're such a perv!\d%K%P
\dBut I'm glad my body fascinates you so much...\d%K%P
Yukari was clearly happy amidst her shyness.%K%P
\dSo...who's going to be the pillow tonight?\d%K%P
\dDoes it have to be just one of us?\d%K%P
\dI was hoping we could hug each other to sleep.\d%K%P
\d...That's the perfect answer, Akira.\d%K%P
\dThat means we should hold each other tighter. I\nwant to be held by you, Akira.\d%K%P
\dIt's Shion's turn after today, so...\d%K%P
Yukari's day would come to an end in the morning.%K%P
Shion would be next, followed by Kaede.%K%P
She would have to wait until her next rotation.%K%P
\dI'll hold you tight, Yukari.\d%K%P
\dYes... As tightly as you possibly can.\d%K%P
\dGive me something to remember until my next\nturn.\d%K%P
